content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price for my apartment is €1,000 per month. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here. If you want to accept this price, you should say, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is €1,000.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student with a responsible nature, I'm seeking more affordable options in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Max. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are seeking more affordable options. If you have any other questions or concerns, feel free to let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
